definitions.definition: To ban a person from a city for five or ten years through the procedure of ostracism .
To exclude a person from a community or from society by not communicating with them or by refusing to acknowledge their presence ; to refuse to associate with or talk to; to shun .

main_definition: ( transitive , Ancient Greece , historical ) To ban a person from a city for five or ten years through the procedure of ostracism . [from mid 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) To exclude a person from a community or from society by not communicating with them or by refusing to acknowledge their presence ; to refuse to associate with or talk to; to shun . [from mid 17th c.]
